data.title: 52 Awarded in 2022 Public Relations and Marketing Excellence Awards Competition
data.meta_description: Business Intelligence Group Names the Winners of the Annual Industry Awards Program for Public Relations and Marketing.
data.text:
Business Intelligence Group Names the Winners of the Annual Industry Awards Program for Public Relations and Marketing

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â

Philadelphia, PAâNovember 1, 2022âThe Business Intelligence Group today announced the winners of the 2022 Public Relations and Marketing Excellence Awards, which identified the leading agencies and corporate departments who delivered quantifiable business results for their respective clients.

âMarketing and public relations teams are continuing to adapt their tactics and approaches in this post-pandemic period,â said Maria Jimenez, Chief Nominations Officer, Business Intelligence Group. âThis yearâs group of winners is marked by individuals and teams who remained flexible to deliver on the clients requirements. Congratulations to you all!â
